pkgmetadata.longdescription: ===========pyhs2===========pyHS2 is a python client driver for connecting to hive server 2.See example.py for an example of how to use it.Please log all issues/new feature requests under the issues tab and I will respond ASAP.Contact @bradruderman or bradruderman@gmail.com with questions.Enjoy![alt tag](https://rs.gwallet.com/r1/pixel/x11399)
